name: Grim Tales: Bloody Mary HD - A Scary Hidden Object Game
name_original: Grim Tales: Bloody Mary HD - A Scary Hidden Object Game
description:
Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue on with a ONE TIME unlock and play offline!
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS… you’ll OWN this game for life.

You receive a desperate call for help from a favorite niece. Something has gone terribly wrong at her boarding school. It’s up to you to help her, but don’t forget this one simple rule: Never look into a mirror after sunset.

•CAN YOU SAVE YOUR NIECE?
Blackhill boarding school has dissolved into chaos when you arrive. The teachers have gone missing and your niece’s classmates are becoming violent.

•STAY AWAY FROM MIRRORS
Shadow creatures haunt from corners and mirrors beckon you. Do not become the next victim.

•BLOODY MARY IS ALWAYS WATCHING!
Discover why Bloody Mary chose this school. Uncover her motivation and put a stop to her evil deeds.

•EXPLORE MORE OF BLOODY MARY’S HISTORY IN THE BONUS GAME!
Unlock this eerie Collector’s Edition to access the bonus chapter. Enjoy the intriguing concept art and wallpapers. Makeover your own secret room in this mysterious Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.
